\"What do you call a factory that makes okay products?\" "\n" \"A satisfactory.\"
\"Why do seagulls fly over the ocean?\" "\n" \"Because if they flew over the bay, we\'d call them bagels.\"
\"What did one wall say to the other?\" "\n" \"I\'ll meet you at the corner.\"
\"Believe you can, and you are halfway there.\" - Theodore Roosevelt
\"Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must always keep moving.\" - Albert Einstein
\"You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.\" - C.S. Lewis
